RNDR_MESHEDOBJ Struct Reference
[RNDR+ Module]

import "rndrplus.idl";

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Meshed Object Information Structure.

Encapsulates the information necessary to render a mesh spread on a set of bones. It is submitted by the ISceneObject, ISceneRenderee::Render function, to the IRndrGeneric.

See also:
ISceneRenderee::Render and IRndrGeneric::RenderMesh

Definition at line 65 of file rndrplus.idl.
